questions.questionTitle: Who are the speakers talking about?
What does the man say about Lenny?
anwers: He used to work for Banana Computers.
He was unemployed for three years.
He took a pay cut with his new position.
He really likes his new job.

questions.questionTitle: What does the woman say about Lenny?

script:
� You know who I ran into yesterday? Lenny Ramos!
� Lenny, our former programmer? What's he doing these days?
� He was out of work for three months after he got laid off here, but now he has a new job with Banana Computers. He loves it, and he's making more money.
� Good for him! He's such a hard worker, I knew he'd land on his feet.
